additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Propylene Glycol, Calcium Pyrophosphate, PVP, PEG/PPG116/16 Copolymer, PEG12, Glycerin, Flavour, Hydrogen Peroxide, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Silica, Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate, Sodium Monofluorphosphate, Sodium Saccharin, Disodium Pyrophosphate, Sucralose, BHT. Contains the equivalent of 1000 ppm Fluoride. NO COLGATE TOOTHPASTE CONTAINS SUGAR.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Contains the equivalent of 1000 ppm Fluoride. 1 Toothpaste

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Some people may experience tooth sensitivity for gum discomfort when using whitening products. This discomfort is temporary and not harmful. If you experience more than mild tooth sensitivity, stop use and consult your dentist.

description: Colgate Optic White Expert High Impact Teeth Whitening Toothpaste With 2% Hydrogen Peroxide
